text: Shravan (Hindi: श्रवण) is an Indian Bollywood television actor. == Career == Shravan started a career in modeling with Elite Agency in Mumbai at the age of 19. He then played a role in Prashant Chhadha's film Kuch Meetha Ho Jaaye opposite newcomer Mahima Chaudhry. After two years, he was given another break by Chhadha in Aap Kaa Surroor as the sidekick of Himesh Reshammiya. Shravan has since starred in a few TV serials. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year !! Film!! Role !!
